title: Airbnb's Brian Chesky Agrees That Current AI Is 'Overrated,' Predicts 'Sudden' Changes Next Decade
description: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky expressed his belief that daily life will remain relatively unchanged by artificial intelligence (AI) in the coming decade. However, he predicts a significant shift in the following decade.
